Using 3.2.1 build.

And here I thought 3.2.1 was perfect :)  

Widget disposed exceptions are many times hard to reproduce.  Are you able to reproduce this bug consistently?  Are you doing anything special other just just clicking the "Add..." button on the extension page and selecting the editor extension?

>Widget disposed exceptions are many times hard to reproduce.

Widget disposed exceptions are hard to reproduce, but it's easy to pinpoint the problem.

I did run across this particular one and did fix it a while back in the 3.3 stream.
